name: Wizard Heist (SpaceTheAce)
description:
You are a wizard on an adventure to find riches. The young wizard breaks into a underground bunker, finding out it has hidden rooms with riches, but only the guards have access. PLAY IN FULLSCREEN.

Top left is the Mind Control Button

Your goal is to collect gold as the wizard.

(make sure on the hammer level push the hammer first)

Press The Button To Begin
